Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Orb = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
Tool.Enabled = true
local orbClone
local tempTorsos = {}
local lightningDamage = 19 local lightningSound
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function shootLightning() local AOE = Vector3.new(14, 14, 14) tempTorsos= {} local playSound if myTorso and orbClone and orbClone.Parent then local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - AOE, myTorso.Position + AOE), vCharacter, 100) for i = 1, #parts do if parts and parts[i].Parent then local character = parts[i].Parent if character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then if not tempTorsos[character.Torso] then playSound = true character.Humanoid:TakeDamage(lightningDamage) character.Humanoid.Sit = true tempTorsos[character.Torso] = character.Torso end end end end
if playSound then lightningSound = Orb:FindFirstChild("LightningSound") if lightningSound then lightningSound:Play() end end
for i, v in pairs(tempTorsos) do local lightningPart = Instance.new("Part") lightningPart.Name = "Lightning" lightningPart.FormFactor = 3 lightningPart.CanCollide = false lightningPart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) lightningPart.Anchored = true
local lightningMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") lightningMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 0.4, 1) lightningMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419828" lightningMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419395" lightningMesh.Parent = lightningPart
lightningPart.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, (orbClone.Position - v.Position).magnitude + 1) local tempCFrame = CFrame.new(orbClone.Position, v.Position) lightningPart.CFrame = tempCFrame + tempCFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) - lightningPart.Size/2.0) lightningMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, lightningPart.Size.Z * 1/14)
lightningPart.Parent = game.Workspace
debris:AddItem(lightningPart, 0.75) end end end
function follow() local count = 0 local stopped = false local duration = 35.0 while orbClone and orbClone.Parent and myTorso and duration > 0 do tick() count = count + 1 for i = 1, 30 do if orbClone then orbClone.CFrame = (CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, math.pi) + myTorso.CFrame.p + (CFrame.Angles(0, 2 * i * math.pi/30, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0)) end wait() duration = duration - wait() end shootLightning() end if orbClone then orbClone:Destroy() end wait(12.5) Tool.Enabled = true Orb.Transparency = 0.0 end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
if not orbClone or not orbClone.Parent then Tool.Enabled = false orbClone = Orb:Clone() Orb.Transparency = 1.0 orbClone.Parent = vCharacter orbClone.Anchored = true coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(follow)) end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
function onUnequipped() if orbClone then orbClone:Destroy() end Orb.Transparency = 0.0 if lightningSound then lightningSound:Stop() end tempTorsos = {} end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
